activities: Provide secure storage and applications supporting client flight department operations including databases containing crew (employee) and passenger information required to support corproate flight operations. Information is entered accessed and maintained by individual client corporations. This could include information on individuals from all EU states and Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client  flight department crew and passenger information; including name, date and place of birth, residential address, passport numbers.
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU and Swiss authorities and The Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure as administered by the Council of Better Business Bureaus (BBB), Inc.
